title: Iron Council
text: The Iron Council is the conclave of [[dwarf]] lords of the [[clans|Mror clan]] of the [[Mror Holds]]. Issues that concern the entire nation go before the Iron Council, which meets in the [[Ferrous House]] in the city of [[Krona Peak]] in [[Mroranon]]hold. Currently, Torlan Mroranon serves as the arbiter of the Council, but each clan governs its own hold.
